meanings.definition: The process of iron or steel deteriorating due to oxidation.
meanings.sent1: The rusting of the old gate made it difficult to open.
meanings.sent2: I learned about rusting in science class.
meanings.sent3: The rusting of the bike chain made it sound like a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: The rusting of the ship's hull symbolized the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The rusting of the metal was a slow but inevitable process.

meanings.definition: The formation of rust on a metal surface.
meanings.sent1: The rusting on the car door was spreading quickly.
meanings.sent2: The rusting on the bridge needed to be repaired.
meanings.sent3: The rusting on the fence looked like tiny orange flowers blooming.
meanings.sent4: The rusting on the old tools told a story of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The rusting on the gate was a reminder of the salty sea air.

meanings.sent1: Leaving the metal out in the rain caused it to start rusting.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned car was slowly rusting away in the field.
meanings.sent3: The bike began rusting after being left outside in the storm.
meanings.sent4: The old pipes were rusting and needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent5: The metal statue was rusting, giving it a unique texture.
